name: Color By Number ⁺
description:
Color By Number is a super fun pixel art coloring book game!

Choose from a huge variety of pages & start coloring today. New coloring pages are added every day, so you'll always have awesome pixel art to color. Relax & enjoy countless hours of stress-free fun!

Each pixel is numbered to help you bring the page to life with color. Save your artwork as an animated video & share with your friends.

Creating colorful art has never been so simple & easy!

Features:
- Feed with huge library of coloring pages.
- New coloring pages added daily.
- Unique variety of animals, characters, foods, landmarks, objects & much more.
- Easy & difficult pages to color.
- Great coloring interface with zooming & navigation.
- Pixel highlighting to find selected pixels.
- Drag to quickly color pixels.
- Autosaving to protect your progress.
- Save your progress on multiple pages & continue them at anytime.
- Save your work as an animated video & share with friends.
- No watermarks.

Premium Coloring Subscription Info:

Color By Number can be used for free. Free users have access to all non-premium coloring page content. Premium content is marked with a crown icon. Users can subscribe to a Premium Coloring Subscription to unlock all premium content & remove all ads. Both free & premium content will be added daily.

Premium Coloring Subscription options:

i) Premium Coloring Weekly offers $3.99 weekly subscription after 3-day free trial for unlocking all content and removing all ads.

ii) Premium Coloring Annual offers $19.99 yearly subscription for unlocking all content and removing all ads.

Both plans offer the same benefits of unlocking all content and removing all ads. Above prices are in United States dollars. These prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.

Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal.
Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

More information about managing subscriptions: https://support.apple.com/HT202039.

Terms of Use: https://www.colorbynumber.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.colorbynumber.com/privacy

What happens if you cancel or turn off auto-renew for your Premium subscription?:
If your subscription expires and is not renewed, you will no longer have access to premium content in the feed. Your saved work on Premium pages will not be lost and will remain available to you in Works. You will still have access to all free content in the feed. You may begin experiencing ads.
